details.description: You need a general movement licence to move animals on, to or from a holding
details.will_continue_on: the Scottish Government Rural Payments and Inspections Directorate website
details.licence_short_description: General movement licence to move animals on, to or from a holding.
details.licence_overview: If you move animals on to or from a holding you must do so under the terms of the general movement licence issued by the Scottish Government Rural Payments and Inspections Directorate. If the conditions of this licence are not met then the right to move livestock may be suspended and an individual movement licence will be required.
